overview:
Eunice Lewis provides administrative services to small to mid-sized organizations. She also assists students with formatting and proofreading/editing term papers.

Ms. Lewis, through Call An Admin, virtually assists with the creation of forms, presentations, flyers, and spreadsheets, as well as typing, proofreading/editing of hard copy and website content. She is a professional and will conduct a free consultation with you to find out your business needs.
